description:
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. The only apartment perched on the roof of this grand historic building.  Unique and amazing views of New York skyline and Hudson River.  Terrace and hammock a wonderful place to hang out in warm weather.  You are in NYC but the stars, the sky, the moon....!
Sofa can be used for extra overnight guest.
4 week rental minimum, starting June

Riverside Park at the feet of the building - wonderful park that runs along the Hudson River. Central Park 5 blocks away.

Easy parking on the street, 4 blocks from the Subway, Bus Downstairs.  Shared City bikes 2 blocks away.  Riverside Park at the foot of the house with bike riding trails.
name: Views !  - Unique penthouse in UWS
